message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $140. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $125 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further, how about $135? This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $135. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product. I'm getting close to my budget, and I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
